DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To assess prevalence peripheral arterial disease ( PAD ) acute stroke patient . Interventions : Assessment ankle brachial index use `` boso-ABI-system 100 '' ( www.boso.de ) . Design : Prospective , open , cohort study . Study size plan : 1500 . Follow-up duration : 3 month .
DOC.criteria: All consecutive adult patient acute ischemic hemorrhagic stroke . Congestive heart failure .
